text.div:
English

Generated Narrative: CodeSystem snapshot-behavior

This case-sensitive code system http://hl7.org/fhir/tools/CodeSystem/snapshot-behavior defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
ignore Ignore ExtensionExtension does not get copied to derived profile
add Add ExtensionExtension gets added to whatever already exists
defer Defer to Existing ExtensionExtension only gets copied if it doesn't already exist
overwrite Overwrite ExtensionExtension overwrites whatever is already in place

Spanish

Generated Narrative: CodeSystem snapshot-behavior

This case-sensitive code system http://hl7.org/fhir/tools/CodeSystem/snapshot-behavior defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
ignore Ignore ExtensionExtension does not get copied to derived profile
add Add ExtensionExtension gets added to whatever already exists
defer Defer to Existing ExtensionExtension only gets copied if it doesn't already exist
overwrite Overwrite ExtensionExtension overwrites whatever is already in place

name: RenderingEngineViewHintsCS
title: Viewing Hints for Rendering Engines (CodeSystem)
description: Code that drives Snapshot generation behavior when copying extensions from base to derived

concept.definition: Extension does not get copied to derived profile
Extension gets added to whatever already exists
Extension only gets copied if it doesn't already exist
Extension overwrites whatever is already in place
